hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira-:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "He who commits suicide by throttling shall keep on throttling himself in the Hell Fire (forever) and he who commits suicide by stabbing himself shall keep on stabbing himself in the Hell-Fire

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي قَاتِلِ النَّفْسِ
chapter.eng-name: What is said about committing suicide
